text:
Building on last month's strong performance, strong economic data & #news that #COVID19 #vaccine may be available soon, #US #stocks scored more gains.
*$DJIA rose 0.63%
*$SPX climbed 1.13%
*$NASDAQ jumped 1.28%
*$GOLD surged 2.10%
#Forex #Commodities
Losses may exceed deposits https://t.co/H81AhgFXFG
